content:
Redshirt freshman wide receiver Cody Jackson during the Sooners open practice on March  PERIOD

Redshirt freshman receiver Cody Jackson announced his NCAA Transfer Portal entry via Twitter on Thursday PERIOD The news was initially reported by On3 Sports Matt Zenitz on Monday PERIOD

pic.twitter.com3enLN3odQe

Jackson appeared in the Sooners spring game on April  and led the red team with three receptions on five targets PERIOD Jackson caught five passes for  yards in two appearances last season although he missed majority of the  slate for an undisclosed reason PERIOD

The 6foot 179pound target was a fourstar recruit in the  cycle according to 247Sports Composite rankings PERIOD He was also ranked the nations No PERIOD  overall player and No PERIOD  receiver PERIOD

Jackson attended Foster High in Richmond Texas the same school as former OU standout CeeDee Lamb PERIOD Jacksons decision to enter the portal leaves Oklahomas receivers room with just eight scholarship players PERIOD

This article was updated at  p.m PERIOD on April  to note Jacksons official entry PERIOD

Success An email has been sent to  with a link to confirm list signup PERIOD

Error There was an error processing your request PERIOD
